name.title: Share name
name.label: Choose a name for your share file
name.info: Must only contain numbers, letters, underscores, dashes, or dots.

region.label: 1-AZ Region
region.description: Resilient and cost-effective deployment in 1 availability zone.

localzone.label: Local Zone
localzone.description: High resilience/high availability deployment for your critical applications across 3 availability zones.

region-3-az.label: 3-AZ Region
region-3-az.description: Deploy your applications as close to your users as possible for low latency and data residency.

availabilityZone.title: Choose your availability zone
availabilityZone.informations: A default availability zone has been selected. You have the option to customize this choice.
